import React , {useState} from 'react'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import PageTitle from '../components/pagetitle'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import img from '../assets/images/avt/avt.png' UserProfile.propTypes = { }; function UserProfile(props) { const [dataCoinTab] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'User Profile', icon: 'fa-user' }, { id: 2, title: 'Referrals', icon: 'fa-share-nodes' }, { id: 5, title: 'Change password', icon: 'fa-lock' }, ]); return (
Peterson kennady

petersonkenn@demo.com

{idx.title}
)) }

); } export default UserProfile;
